title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

organizations.name: Al Qaeda
quotes: I don’t know if Al Qaeda is in Liberia, frankly. We’ve heard rumors in the past, during the Taylor era, when he was doing dealings with a lot of shady characters that he had.
If that were ever brought to us we would rule it out very quickly. I doubt it.

organizations.name: IMF (International Monetary Fund)
quotes: Today a majority of that debt has been cancelled and we’ve completed our first program with the IMF (International Monetary Fund).

roles.title: President
quotes: Thank you very much, Madam President. It was a real privilege to talk with you.
I don’t know if Al Qaeda is in Liberia, frankly. We’ve heard rumors in the past, during the Taylor era, when he was doing dealings with a lot of shady characters that he had.

Today, you know, our image of being a pariah state, a failed state, has turned around completely. Whereas people — Liberians — were afraid to carry a Liberian passport, because you’d be seen as this nation of death and destruction. Today, Liberians are very proud to carry their passport because everybody sees Liberia as beginning to be uplifted and beginning to become a possible model of success, a post-conflict success story.
